X

xyz.acygn.mokapot - package xyz.acygn.mokapot
A library for transparently making Java programs distributed.
xyz.acygn.mokapot.util - package xyz.acygn.mokapot.util
Utility functions used by the distributed communication system.
xyz.acygn.mokapot.wireformat - package xyz.acygn.mokapot.wireformat
Classes and methods for working with the serialised format used to represent data sent by this library over the network.
